com.rath.rathbot.cmd.msg.faq

Class FAQCmd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rath.rathbot.cmd.RBCommand
      • com.rath.rathbot.cmd.msg.faq.FAQCmd

  • public class FAQCmd
extends RBCommand
    This class handles the 'faq' command, which provides a way to store and recall any text.
    Author:
    Tim Backus tbackus127@gmail.com

      • hasFaq

        public static final boolean hasFaq(java.lang.String faq)
        Tests if the FAQ map has a specific ID registered.
        Parameters:
        faq - the FAQ ID.
        Returns:
        true if the map's key set contains the ID; false if not.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • executeCommand

        public boolean executeCommand(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser author,
                              sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IChannel channel,
                              java.lang.String[] tokens,
                              int tokenDepth)
        Description copied from class: RBCommand
        Executes the command. Any external data needed must first be added to the child command's class via other non-inherited methods. See /ref/templates.txt for instructions to correctly override this method.
        Overrides:
        executeCommand in class RBCommand
        Parameters:
        author - the IUser that executed the command.
        channel - the channel the command was received from.
        tokens - an array of Strings that were split at commas.
        tokenDepth - the index of the token we are working with.
        Returns:
        true if the recursive command search can be stopped; false if not.
